data.title: Pope Francis has excommunicated a pedophile Argentine priest, who admitted to sexually abusing four teenagers
Kasparov: Stop Putin now or pay the price later
One of the VIPs who sexually abused boys at an apartment complex near Parliament has been identified as a former deputy director of MI6
Protests flare in Mexico after attorney general's 'enough, I'm tired' remarks | ‘Ya me canse’ becomes a rallying call for anger over the government’s handling of the apparent killing of 43 students
Iraqi troops takes back control of Iraq's biggest oil refinery from ISIS
Five nuclear engineers murdered near Damascus
A Saudi oil firm paid former British prime minister Tony Blair a fee of about £41,000 a month and a 2 percent slice of each contract he helped arrange.

Police in Iguala, Mexico, abducted 43 college students who were handed over to a drug cartel and murdered. The mayor ordered police to attack the students, who were raising money in the area, because he thought they would disrupt a speech his wife was making.
Elon Musk and Google want to develop satellites for global internet access.
Jesus 'married Mary Magdalene and had children', according to ancient manuscript
